tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Had a wonderful Experience with the Doctor. He recently performed a high risk surgery on my Grandmother who is 88 years old . She fell and fractured her hip bone, and surgery was the only way to treat her. Once all the pre-tests were done, it was concluded that she is highly unfit for the surgery due to her heart condition as well, hence Anesthesiologist refused to proceed. However,  the Doctor was very confident that he could perform the surgery , which speaks volumes about his experience and skills in his field. This put a lot of confidence in us as well and we were ready to go ahead with the surgery , Although we had to move my grandmother to a different hospital in which the Doctor also helped us a lot.

Finally the surgery was successfully done and my Grandmother is safe and back home, still recovering though. However, the Doctor is still in touch with us for all the post operation procedures.

He indeed is great and supremely skilled in his field, and the best thing I appreciate and grateful for is that he stayed in touch ever after the treatment was over and happy to help and answer any concerns we have over the phone , Highly recommended !!
reply_text: Good morning Vinay Thanks for your time and kind words ,I just do my job with full faith in Almighty God üôè

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I have been a patient of Dr Bageja for the last 12 years regarding all my Ortho problems .
Recently  i was suffering from frozen shoulder.For my severe shoulder pain I tried many treatments like physiotherapy acupressure home remedies n medication but all in vain.
Finally I went to Dr Bageja with much hope as usual.
There was tremendous improvement within 15
days.my pain was hocus -pocus with a single injection.
Mobility of shoulder is increasing day by day.
Wonderful experience.he is very pleasant, kind ,caring and down to earth doctor.He listens to the patient and explains the line of treatment thoroughly.
More over he doesn't run after money that is his uniqueness .
Thank God I m in the safest hands 
I will highly recommend Dr Bageja for all Ortho problems as per my experience.
Gratitude!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I went to see Dr. Pradeep for pain in hips and lower back that didn't go away after 5 months of self medication. He correctly diagnosed  the condition even before I shared the MRI & blood test results with him. He explained the affected joints with a diagram and provided detailed description about the medication. I was not sure if I could get rid of the pain permanently with only medicines but after 2 months of taking the medicines prescribed by Dr. Pradeep I stopped feeling pain when doing my daily activities. Earlier it was painful to take even a single step but now I can walk several kilometers without any pain or discomfort.
reply_text: Thanks Aman for Positive Testimonial and your Precious time

tags: Value for money,
review: Doctor is friendly and did checkup well. All the prescribed medicine was available in the clinic itself and handed me the same. But the moment I asked for bill/receipt doctor refused to give any of those medicines because he was concerned about GST, ******** ****** *** ********* ** ******* I had to look for medicines in other stores in acute pain, one of them which is unavailable in stores and Also online stores. Also, for two xray report I have been charged ‚Çπ1400 (not sure if this is the standard amount elsewhere). Surprising fact, MRI was mentioned in the prescription which neither doctor nor the receptionist cared to tell me about. It was only when I noticed I insisted to enquire. And, response received was -"it is to be done in the next check up". ** **** **** *** *** **** *** *** **** ****** ******* **** **** **** ******* ** ******** Also, it was mentioned in back of the prescription and in between the medicines prescribed, which makes it difficult for a patient to notice. *** ***** **** **** ** ********** ***** *** ****** *** ****** Also, the receptionist is rude.
